title: Nariko's Map
description:
The adventures of an all-female ninja army in medieval Japan.
  Japan, 1562. Young Nariko finds herself on a farm for misfit girls after she narrowly survives a brutal samurai attack on her family. But the farm hides a secret: it is a training camp for a secret army of all-female ninja. Smart and brave, Nariko is a valuable spy, and she soon finds herself drawn back into the very war that tore her family apart, as she is haunted by unanswered questions about her past.   About the Book Series  Legends of the Kunoichi is a historical fiction adventure series set against the dramatic historical backdrop of medieval Japan. Featuring an ensemble of strong female characters, the stories are inspired by the legends of Chiyome Mochizuki, founder of a secret all-female ninja army.
author: Alex Redwood
